page.description: Evaluate an expression in the context of the table.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.EVAL() Syntax &ltTBL>.EVAL( Expression as C ) ArgumentDescription ExpressionAn Xbasic expression.
Description The &ltTBL>.EVAL() method evaluates an expression in the context of a table. Example dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") ? tbl.eval("firstname+lastname") = "Mederos Michael"
See Also Table Functions and Methods, Expression Evaluation Functions and Methods
